body_html:
Yep, I figured out that I make a mistake with cudnn soft link during install cuda. Your should make a soft link in cuda-8.0(or cuda8.0, I dont remember) but not in cuda. like this:

sudo cp cudnn.h /usr/local/cuda-8.0/include/
sudo cp lib* /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/
cd /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/sudo rm -rf libcudnn.so libcudnn.so.6
sudo ln -s libcudnn.so.6.0.21 libcudnn.so.6
sudo ln -s libcudnn.so.6 libcudnn.so

body:
Yep, I figured out that I make a mistake with cudnn soft link during install cuda. Your should make a soft link in cuda-8.0(or cuda8.0, I dont remember) but not in cuda. like this:

sudo cp cudnn.h /usr/local/cuda-8.0/include/
sudo cp lib* /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/    
cd /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/sudo rm -rf libcudnn.so libcudnn.so.6
sudo ln -s libcudnn.so.6.0.21 libcudnn.so.6  
sudo ln -s libcudnn.so.6 libcudnn.so
